snippet: While academics across the country have embraced the Occupy movement as participants, a smaller number are working to turn the sprawling movement into publishable data.
abstract: Social scientists are studying Occupy Wall Street movement in effort to get a more precise understanding of the demographics and motivations of those marching and protesting; many academics are studying the movement, but a smaller number are tackling the difficult task of producing publishable data.
lead_paragraph: While academics across the country have embraced the Occupy movement as participants, a smaller number are working to turn the sprawling movement into publishable data.

headline.seo: Academia Becomes Occupied With Occupy Movement
